title: LEGO Roses - Building Toy for Kids, Girls & Boys, Ages 8+ - Artificial, Fake Roses for Home Decor & Display - Gift Idea for Plant & Flower Lovers - 40460
features: The perfect gift - Show someone how special they are with this LEGO Roses (40460) building kit. Makes a great present for Mother’s Day, Woman's Day, Birthday, Anniversary, or just-because.
Brighten up any room - This set includes 2 buildable red roses with adjustable stems.
Mark a special occasion - Surprise your special someone with these beautiful buildable roses, perfect for any occasion or just because
Easy to assemble - 120 pieces of build and display delight. Simply follow the included instructions, build, and put into the vase of your choice
Dimensions - Each rose stem measures over 10 in. (26 cm) long – perfect for displaying in a vase.
LEGO botanicals - Expand the beauty of your home with any of the LEGO botanicals collections (sold separately) to create a vibrant bouquet
